Package Menu.CommentHandler

package Menu.CommentHandler
The `CommentHandler` subpackage contains classes and interfaces related to managing and handling comments within the system. Comments can include enquiries and suggestions. This package provides functionalities for editing, deleting, viewing, and replying to comments. It also includes interfaces that define common comment handling behaviors. Classes in this package are used to interact with and manage comments associated with various entities, such as camps and users. Users with appropriate roles, such as students and staff members, can use these classes to perform actions related to comments.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Menu
    The `Menu` package contains classes that define user interfaces and menus for interacting with the system.
    Menu.CommentHandler.Interfaces
    The `Interfaces` subpackage contains Java interfaces that define the contract for specific comment-related operations and behaviors.
    Menu.CampHandlers
    The `CampHandler` subpackage contains classes that handle various operations and interactions related to camps within the system.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    StaffReplyEnquiry
    The `StaffReplyEnquiry` class implements the `IReplying` interface to provide functionality for staff members to reply to enquiries within a camp's comment section.
    StaffReplySuggestion
    The `StaffReplySuggestion` class implements the `IReplying` interface to provide functionality for staff members to reply to suggestions made by students in a camp.
    StaffViewEnquiry
    The `StaffViewEnquiry` class implements the `IViewing` interface to provide functionality for staff members to view enquiries in a camp.
    StaffViewSuggestion
    The `StaffViewSuggestion` class implements the `IViewing` interface to provide functionality for staff members to view suggestions in a camp.
    StudentAddEnquiry
    The `StudentAddEnquiry` class implements the `IAdding` interface to provide functionality for students to add an enquiry to a camp.
    StudentAddSuggestion
    The `StudentAddSuggestion` class implements the `IAdding` interface to provide functionality for students to add a suggestion to a camp.
    StudentDeleteEnquiry
    The `StudentDeleteEnquiry` class implements the `IDeleting` interface to provide functionality for students to delete their own enquiries from a camp.
    StudentDeleteSuggestion
    The `StudentDeleteSuggestion` class implements the `IDeleting` interface and is responsible for deleting a suggestion comment in the application.
    StudentEditEnquiry
    The `StudentEditEnquiry` class implements the `IEditing` interface and is responsible for editing an existing enquiry comment in the application.
    StudentEditSuggestion
    The `StudentEditSuggestion` class implements the `IEditing` interface and is responsible for allowing students to edit their own suggestion comments in the application.
    StudentReplyEnquiry
    The `StudentReplyEnquiry` class implements the `IReplying` interface and allows students to reply to enquiry comments made by other users within a camp.
    StudentViewEnquiry
    The `StudentViewEnquiry` class implements the `IViewing` interface and allows students to view their own enquiry comments within a camp.
    StudentViewSuggestion
    The `StudentViewSuggestion` class implements the `IViewing` interface and allows students to view their own suggestion comments within a camp.
